rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value: Set a starting total, say 20. Let your child choose whether to go first or second. During the first turn, a player chooses to subtract 1 or 2 from the current total. After the first turn, a player may subtract any number from 1 up to twice the number used on the last turn. The first person to reach 0 wins (an alternative rule is they lose). Once children learn to play this without writing anything down, it is a fun travel game.
